channel.title: ~ Dedications ~ on TechXero Github
channel.description: Recent content in ~ Dedications ~ on TechXero Github

item.title: For EFLinux
item.description: About This is where EFLinux Grub Theme dedicated to his fans will be. Constantly updated so keep coming back. I included a script that makes installing much easier, just follow steps below : 1- Git Clone Repo git clone https://github.com/TechXero/EFLinuxGrub.git 2- Set Exec permissions sudo chmod +x ./install.sh 3- Install Theme sudo ./install.sh Enjoy ;)
